title: ITBUYR ANNOUNCES NEW PARTNERSHIP AGREEMENTS WITH MAJOR TELECOM PROVIDERS TO PROMOTE COMPETITIVE PRICING ON DAILY DEAL SITE
text:
Los Angeles, California, October 1st, 2015
ITBuyr (ITBuyr.com) has secured long-term agreements with IT and Telecom Carriers to provide promotional deals at wholesale prices. ITBuyr is becoming the Groupon of the IT and Telecom industry by leveraging its vendor relationships as a Telecom Brokerage to offer daily deals to promote products and services such as VoIP, Cloud Computing, Data Centers, Internet Access, and Mobile Phone Bundling to small, midsize and large enterprises.
ITBuyr offers three new IT Services deals per week. These deals offer the best carrier deals either through showcase monthly promotions or by creating custom negotiated one off deals. Vendors have shown a great willingness to promote aggressive pricing to acquire new customer bases and selling future services.
ITBuyr was founded in 2014 with the notion that small business owners using IT and Telecom services are not always privy to the available services, and should have access to find better deals. Further, ITBuyr is eliminating consumer frustration and confusion, and is allowing the consumer to take advantage of pricing that is not always available due to the size of their deal. ITBuyr’s volume based pricing allows for promotion pricing that is typically only available to large companies to companies of any size.
